categories.name: Bus
categories.description: This category includes large vehicles designed for carrying passengers. Buses are commonly used for public transportation, group travel, and other mass transit purposes.

categories.name: Sedan
categories.description: Sedans are a type of passenger car with separate compartments for engine, passenger, and cargo space. They typically have four doors, a fixed roof, and are known for their comfortable seating and practicality.

categories.name: SUV
categories.description: SUV stands for Sports Utility Vehicle. These vehicles are designed with a higher ground clearance, spacious interior, and often offer off-road capabilities. SUVs are popular for their versatility, accommodating larger groups and providing ample cargo space.

categories.name: Hatchback
categories.description: Hatchbacks are compact cars that feature a rear door, typically hinged at the roof, providing access to the cargo area. They are known for their practicality, fuel efficiency, and versatile interior space.
